tickets.subject: Feed to Zillow & Trulia
tickets.description:
Good morning,

 

Once again, after weeks of mentioning that the open houses feed is not functioning between APR & Zillow/Trulia,

the open houses I have scheduled for this weekend are once again not showing up.

 

Is there any ways, we can really fix this problem permanently?

 

Why is the feed working fine between Realtor.com, Redfin etc and NOT with Zillow/Trulia?

 

Thanks for resolving this issue.

 

Warmest Regards,

 

 

STEPHANIE TICE

REALTOR - PRESIDENT’S CLUB

CELL 925.324.2416

LIC#01388697

STEPHANIETICE.APR.COM (http://WWW.STEPHANIETICE.APR.COM)

I am never too busy for your referrals.

They are the biggest compliments.

Please look into this for me.  It is very important for me to access our relo shared drive when I am working from home.

 

Thank you!

 

Michi Olson, SGMS, SGDS

Vice President, Global Business Development & Relocation

Alain Pinel Realtors

Tel: 925-935-1271

michi@apr.com

“Serving the San Francisco Bay Area”

tickets.subject: Outlook Folders
tickets.description:
Hi There

Tonight I had over 15 outlook subfolders disappear. I was working on my lap top when they disappeared. I looked in the trash and they were not there. Checked all other folders to see if they got moved into another folder. Also, I logged into outlook 365 and two of the 15 folders were there but one was empty.  On my phone 2 folders were on the phone. I am wondering if there was some kind of glitch in the system.

 

Curious: they were only sub-folders in a current folder (2018).  I have older folders and they seem to be in tact.

 

I am working on 15 properties and need the information back. How do I do this?

 

CHERYL HATA

Alain Pinel Realtors    l    Orinda

Tel: 510.912.5882  BRE 01389346 

FaceBook (https://www.facebook.com/CherylHataRealEstate/)   I  Client Reviews (https://www.zillow.com/profile/Cheryl-Hata/#reviews)

HataHomes.com (http://www.hatahomes.com/)

tickets.raw_subject: Reminder: Monthly MC Call starts in 1 Day
tickets.description:
This reminder email was sent to 11 registrants. ----------------------------------------------------------- Dear APR, This is a reminder that you're an organizer for "Monthly MC Call " which will begin in 1 Day  on: Mon, Apr 30, 2018 2:30 PM - 3:30 PM PDT Please send your questions, comments and feedback to: training@apr.com *********************************************************** How to Join the Webinar *********************************************************** 1. Click the link to join the webinar at the specified time and date: https://global.gotowebinar.com/ojoin/9169349022123389186/200000000000170204 Before joining, be sure to check system requirements to avoid any connection issues. Note: This link should not be shared with others; it is unique to you. https://link.gotowebinar.com/email-welcome?role=staff&source=coOrganizerReminderEmail&language=english 2. Choose one of the following audio options: TO USE YOUR COMPUTER'S AUDIO:
When the webinar begins, you will be connected to audio using your computer's microphone and speakers (VoIP). A headset is recommended. --OR-- TO USE YOUR TELEPHONE:If you prefer to use your phone, you must select "Use Telephone" after joining the webinar and call in using the numbers below. United States: +1 (213) 929-4232 Access Code: 905-741-330 Audio PIN: Shown after joining the webinar Webinar ID: 448-165-595 *********************************************************** Brought to you by GoToWebinar® Webinars Made Easy® View the GoToWebinar Privacy Policy: https://secure.logmein.com/home/en/policies/overview (c) 1997-2018 LogMeIn, Inc. Heidi Lewis

tickets.subject: blocked email
tickets.description:
I have an important message from amotter@homesale.com.  She can’t send emails to me.  Apparently, it is blocked from my end.

Would you please unblock this sender ASAP?

 

Thank you,

 

Michi Olson, SGMS, SGDS

Vice President, Global Business Development & Relocation

Alain Pinel Realtors

Tel: 925-935-1271

michi@apr.com

“Serving the San Francisco Bay Area”

I have not and will not verify or investigate any information supplied by third parties.

tickets.subject: Fonia Humphries - IMAP Clarification
tickets.description: Let her know that IMAP needs to be upgraded onto her email provider so that she is able to delete on any machine and it sync across her devices.
